name: Panotapecon
description:
You are just out of your doctorate on blowfish studies but since you didn't find a job you took one at your local factory

Your job is to fix stuffs, everything, as long as it's on your conveyor belt you can fix it
And hey, if you can't... well that stay between you and me but, just use some flox tape and boom nobody will notice, don't get caught tho, you wouldn't want to get a "surprise" inspection

Anyway good luck with your work, on my side I'll go back, uh... fixing the coffee machine, yeah! Good idea, me

Controls:
WASD: Move
E: Grab an object
